body: We crossed Mostapha, This is for sure a normal issue, but ... your model is "not good". I exploded it some times but still is remains one object in Rhino. So i'm not sure how you can flip the normal on individual parts of your mesh. I'm getting "better" results than you but they are some remaining surfaces that have inverted normal direction, so they are not well calculated. See image below. Once in GH, the meshing size seems not affect the buildings. They are all triangulated (as they came from Rhino. Attached the file i used with internalized geometry. -A. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/pUv0rT5h6PLXwGdE6woaPBS04PUM9Iy7ri561f-BZKTEpRYM4Xof1nT1C-sv6hkUpJwHCxiBeBFu7RC683PZyDwjiIpaZVBH/Capture.JPG)
